
### Example
```jsx
const options = [
    {key: 'a', value: 'apple'},
    {key: 'b', value: 'banana'},
    {key: 'c', value: 'cucumber'},
    {key: 'delta', value: 'pear'},
    {key: 'e', value: 'tomato'},
];
const onClick = (notification) => {
    alert(`Selected option key=${notification.selectedOption.key} value=${notification.selectedOption.value}`);
}
<LabeledDropdown
    dropdownOptions={options}
    selectedOption={options[1]}
    onSelectOption={onClick}
    labelText='fruit'
/>
```
